testcase.name: Login to Application
testcase.system-out: Given Access the url link...................................................passed When User enters the login details..........................................passed Then User will not get an error message "Username and password did not match or not found".passed And User will be able to see Home Page......................................passed When Access menu profile....................................................passed And Logout from the application.............................................passed Then User will be redirected back to login page.............................passed

testcase.name: Invalid Login to Application
testcase.system-out: Given Access the url link...................................................passed When User enters the wrong login details....................................passed Then User will be redirected back to login page.............................passed And User will get an error message "Username and password did not match or not found".passed
